K07pplg202u:1: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat* mahāguṇasamanvāgato bhagavaṃn avaivartiko bodhisatvo manāsatvaḥ aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇaguṇasamanvāgato
K07pplg202u:2: 6 bhagavann avaivartiko bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ aparimitaguṇasamanvāgato bhagavann avaivartiko bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ bhagavān āha* evam
K07pplg202u:3: 7 etat subhūte evam etat* mahāguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte avaivartiko bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇaguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte avaivartiko bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
K07pplg202u:4: 8 aparimitaguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte avaivartiko bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy anenānantāparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhaḥ asādhāraṇaṃ
K07pplg202u:5: 9 tatra ca jñāne sthitvā avaivartiko bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ pratisaṃvido 'bhinirharati /
K07pplg202u:6: yābhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena pṛṣṭaḥ prativacanair na śakyaṃ paryādātuṃ subhūtir āha /
K07pplg202u:7: 10 pratibalo bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddho gaṃgānadīvālukopamān kalpān avaivartikasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyākāraliṃganimittāni nirdeṣṭuṃ /
K07pplg202u:8: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittair avaivartiko bodhisatvo
K07pplg202u:11: yatra sthitvā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayati /
K07pplg202u:14: sādhu sādhu subhūte sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam avaivartikānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām arthāya tathāgataṃ gaṃbhīragaṃbhīrāṇi sthānāni yāny adhivacanaṃ
K07pplg202u:17: nirvāṇasyaivaitad bhagavann adhivacanan na punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ /
K07pplg202u:19: sarvadharmāṇām apy etat subhūte adhivacanaṃ gaṃbhīram iti /
K07pplg202u:22: [GBM 572.1 = LPG(Ch) 202v] saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ subhūte gaṃbhīraṃ cakṣur api
K07pplg202u:23: subhūte gaṃbhīraṃ yāvan mano 'pi subhūte gaṃbhīraṃ yāvad bodhir api subhūte gaṃbhīrā
K07pplg202u:27: 2 saṃjñāyā saṃskārāṇāṃ yathā vijñānasya tathatā tathā gaṃbhīraṃ yāvad yathā bodhes tathatā tathā gaṃbhīraṃ /
K07pplg202u:29: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ rūpasya tathatā yāvat kathaṃ bodhes tathatā /
K07pplg202u:32: 3 rūpaṃ nānyatra rūpāt tathatā yāvad yatra subhūte vijñānatathatāyāṃ na vijñānaṃ nānyatra vijñānāt tathatā yāvad yatra bodhitathatāyāṃ na bodhir nānyatra bodhes tathatā /
K07pplg202u:35: 4 bodhisatvo mahāsatvo rūpāc ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ
K07pplg202u:36: saṃskārebhyo vijñānāc ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcita sarvagrahebhyaś ca laukikalokottarebhyaḥ
K07pplg202u:38: 5 sāsravānāsravebhyo nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitaḥ bhagavān āha /
K07pplg202u:39: yaḥ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatva imāni gaṃbhīragaṃbhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni cintayiṣyati /
K07pplg202u:42: yathā prajñāpāramitāyām ājñaptam evaṃ mayā śikṣitavyam* yathā prajñāpāramitāyām upadiṣṭam* ayaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ tathaiva
K07pplg202u:43: 7 saṃpādayan yathā prajñāpāramitāyām ākhyātaṃ tathopanidhyāyaṃs tathopaparīkṣamāṇas tathā yujyamānas tathā ghaṭhamānas tathā vyāyacchamāno yathā prajñāpāramitāyām upadiṣṭaṃ /
K07pplg202u:47: kaḥ panar vādo yaḥ avyavakīrṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhipratisaṃyuktair
K07pplg202u:49: tadyathāpi nāma syāt subhūte puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritas tenānyatarayā striyā sārdham abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saṃketaḥ kṛto
K07pplg202u:50: 10 sā ca strī paraparigṛhītā na śaknuyād gṛhān niṣkrāntuṃ /
K07pplg202u:51: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktās tasya puruṣasya vitarkā bhaveyuḥ /
K07pplg202u:53: strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃs tasya puruṣasya vitarkā bhaveyuḥ
K07pplg202u:54: 11 imam eti iyam āgatā etayā sārdhaṃ niṣatsyāmi paricārayiṣyāmi bhagavān āha tat
K07pplg202u:55: kiṃ manyase subhūte rātrer atyayād divasasyātyayāt kiyantas tasya puruṣasya vitarkā
K07pplg202u:57: 12 sugata tasya puruṣasya rātrer atyayād divasasya cātyayād vitarkā varteran* /
K07pplg202u:59: yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya rātreś ca divasasya cātyayād vitarkā varterann iyantaḥ kalpān bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
K07pplg202u:60: 13 saṃsārāc chorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ śikṣeta /
K07pplg202u:64: 14 yair doṣair bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartate 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evaṃ yogam
K07pplg202u:65: anuyuktaḥ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nena vihāreṇa viharan yathā prajñāpāramitāyām
K07pplg202u:67: [GBM 573.1 = LPG(Ch) 203r] yat kuśalamūlaṃ parigṛhṇāti tena gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyur na tat tasya kuśalamūlasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti /
K07pplg202u:69: 2 api yāvat saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api nopaiti //
K07pplg202u:70: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ /
K07pplg202u:73: buddharatne dharmaratne saṃgharatne tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet* āha /
K07pplg202u:74: bahu bhagavaṃ bahu sugata aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam
K07pplg202u:76: ayam eva tataḥ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bahutaraṃ punyaṃ prasaved ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ yogam āpadyate / tat kasya
K07pplg202u:77: 5 hetoḥ eṣo hi bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ nayo yena nayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate /
K07pplg202u:78: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṃganadīvālukopamāṃ
K07pplg202u:79: 6 kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan* śrotaāpanneṣu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiṣv anāgāmiṣv arhatsu
K07pplg202u:80: pratyekabuddheṣu tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpaye tat kiṃ manyase subhūte
K07pplg202u:81: 7 api nu sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ tatonidanaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet* āha /
K07pplg202u:84: ayam eva subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet*
K07pplg202u:85: 8 ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ yogam āpadyeta /
K07pplg202u:86: tat kasya hetoḥ atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmīm atikramya
K07pplg202u:89: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṃgānadīvālukopamāṃ kalpāṃs tiṣṭhaṃ yāpayaṃ
K07pplg202u:90: 10 dānaṃ dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣe kṣāntyā saṃpādayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānāni samāpadyeta prajñāṃ bhāvayet* api nu sa tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet* āha /
K07pplg202u:91: bahu bhagavaṃ bahu sugata bhagavān āha / ataḥ sa
K07pplg202u:92: 11 subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ
K07pplg202u:93: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvā ekadivasam api dānaṃ dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣet*
K07pplg202u:95: 12 dhyānāni samāpadyeta prajñāṃ bhāvaye tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte mātaiṣā
K07pplg202u:96: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā janayitryaiṣā bodhisatvāṇāṃ mahāsatvāṇāṃ
K07pplg202u:99: 13 prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ sarvadharmāṃ paripūrayaṃti /
K07pplg202u:101: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito
K07pplg202u:102: 14 gaṃgānadīvālukopamāṃ kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan* dharmadānaṃ dadyāt* api sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet* āha /
K07pplg202u:103: bahu bhagavaṃ bahu sugata bhagavān āha /
K07pplg202u:105: [GBM 574.1 = LPG(Ch) 203v] kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya
K07pplg202u:106: iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvā ekadivasam api dharmadānaṃ
K07pplg202u:107: dadyāt* tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
K07pplg202u:108: 2 prajñāpāramitāyā virahitaḥ sa sarvākārajñatayā virahito yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvo
K07pplg202u:109: mahāsatvaḥ avirahitaḥ sarvākārajñatayā avirahitaḥ tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvenānuttarāṃ
K07pplg202u:111: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṃgānadībālukopamān kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan
K07pplg202u:112: 4 yogam āpadyeta caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yāva śunyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu yāvad yogam āpadyeta sarvasamādhiṣu /
K07pplg202u:113: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu
K07pplg202u:115: bahu bhagavaṃ bahu sugata bhagavān āha /
K07pplg202u:116: ayam eva sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyām
K07pplg202u:117: 6 ekadivasam api yogam āpadyeta caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yāvad aṣṭādaśaṣv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu /
K07pplg202u:119: asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśaḥ yad bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
K07pplg202u:122: sthānaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte vidyate yad bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahitaḥ sarvākārajñatayā nvivarteta
K07pplg202u:124: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitayā avirahitena bhavitavyaṃ /
K07pplg202u:125: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṃgānadīvālukopamāṃ
K07pplg202u:126: 9 kalpāṃs tiṣṭhaṃs tac cāmiṣadānaṃ tac ca dharmadānaṃ tāṃś ca pratisaṃlayanapratisaṃyuktāṃ
K07pplg202u:127: manasikārān anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayed api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ
K07pplg202u:131: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K07pplg202u:132: 11 yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvā ekadaivasikaṃ cāmiṣadānaṃ tac ca dharmadānaṃ tāṃś ca pratisaṃlayanapratisaṃyuktān
K07pplg202u:133: ananasikārān anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayet* tat kasya hetoḥ eṣa hi paramaḥ pariṇāmo
K07pplg202u:134: 12 yad uta prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmaḥ yaḥ punaḥ prajñāpāramitayā vinā pariṇāmo nāsau pariṇāmaḥ /
K07pplg202u:135: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
K07pplg202u:138: yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṃgānadīvālukopamāṃ kalpāṃs tiṣṭhann
K07pplg202u:140: yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayed api nu sa kulaputro
K07pplg202u:141: vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet*
K07pplg202u:142: 2 āha bahu bhagavaṃ bahu sugata bhagavān āha /
K07pplg202u:143: atas sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvā ekadaivasikam
K07pplg202u:144: 3 api kusalamūlam anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayet* tat kasya hetoḥ prajñāpāramitā
K07pplg202u:145: pūrvaṃgatā hi subhūte sarvapariṇamanāt tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvenānuttarāṃ
K07pplg202u:148: yat punar bhagavaṃn abhisaṃskāraḥ kalpita ukto bhagavatā tat kathaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K07pplg202u:149: 5 vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet* sa ca bhagavaṃn anabhisaṃskāreṇa śakyaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiṃ
K07pplg202u:150: cotpādayituṃ nyāmaṃ cāvakramitum* śrotaāpattiphalaṃ cānuprāptum* yāvad anuttarāṃ
K07pplg202u:153: evam etat subhūte evam etat* na hy anabhisaṃskāreṇa śakyaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiṃ cotpādayituṃ
K07pplg202u:154: nyāmaṃ cāvakramitum* śrotaāpattiphalaṃ cānuprāptum* yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum*
K07pplg202u:155: 7 api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte tad api dānam anabhisaṃskāro bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śunyakam evākhyāti riktakam eva tucchakam evāsārakam evākhyāti
K07pplg202u:156: 8 tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvo adhyātmaśunyatāyāṃ suśikṣito
K07pplg202u:159: 9 saṃskṛtaśunyatāyām asaṃskṛtaśunyatāyām atyaṃtaśunyatāyām anavarāgraśunyatāyām anavakāraśunyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśunyatāyāṃ
K07pplg202u:160: 10 anupalaṃbhaśunyatāyām abhāvaśunyatāyāṃ svabhāvaśunyatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśunyatāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ āsu śunyatāsu sthitvā yathā yathā
K07pplg202u:162: tathā tathā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhavati /
K07pplg202u:163: yathā yathā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhavati /
K07pplg202u:165: 12 asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati āha /
K07pplg202u:166: asaṃkhyeyasya ca bhagavaṃn aprameyasya cāparimāṇasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ bhagavān āha /
K07pplg202u:167: asaṃkhyeyam api195 subhūte yat saṃkhyāṃ nopaiti
K07pplg202u:168: 13 saṃskṛte vā dhātav asaṃskṛte va dhātau aprameyam iti subhūte yasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu /
K07pplg202u:169: aparimāṇam iti subhūte yan na śakyaṃ pramātuṃ /
K07pplg202u:170: [GBM 576.l = LPG(Ch) 204v] āha / syād bhagavaṃ paiyāyo yad rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam
K07pplg202u:171: aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ bhavet* vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñānam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam
K07pplg202u:174: 2 yena paryāyeṇa rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ bhavet* vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ bhavet* āha /
K07pplg202u:176: 3 asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ bhaved vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam bhavet* bhagavān āha /
K07pplg202u:177: rūpam api subhūte śunyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam
K07pplg202u:179: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam api subhūte śunyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ āha /
K07pplg202u:180: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃn rūpam eva śunyaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam eva śunyaṃ / na punaḥ
K07pplg202u:182: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śunyā ity ākhyātāḥ āha /
K07pplg202u:183: śunyā bhagavan sarvadharmā iti tathāgatenākhyātā yā ca bhagavaṃn śunyatā / akṣayāpi
K07pplg202u:184: 6 sā / aprameyāpi sā aparimāṇāpi sā na hi bhagavaṃ śunyatāyāḥ saṃkhyopalabhyate na pramāṇaṃ na parimāṇam upalabhyate /
K07pplg202u:185: tasmāt tarhi bhagavaṃ naiṣān dharmāṇām arthato
K07pplg202u:188: evam etat subhūte evam etat* naiṣān dharmāṇām arthato vā vyaṃjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate /
K07pplg202u:190: 8 akṣayam iti vā aprameyam iti vā /
K07pplg202u:191: śunyam iti vā ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā anabhisaṃskāram iti vā anutpāda iti vā virāga iti vā nirodha iti vā nirvāṇam
K07pplg202u:192: 9 iti vā / deśanābhinirhāranirdeśa eṣa tathāgatasyākṣayam iti vā yāvan nirvāṇam iti vā /
K07pplg202u:194: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac cedaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathāgatena deśitā anabhilāpyā /
K07pplg202u:199: evam etat subhūte evam etat* sarvadharmā subhūte anabhilāpyāḥ yā subhūte dharmāṇām anabhilāpyatā sā
K07pplg202u:200: 11 śunyatā na ca śunyatāyāṃ kiṃ cid abhilapitaṃ nāpi śunyatā śakyā abhilapituṃ āha /
K07pplg202u:201: kaccit punar bhagavaṃn anabhilāpyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā /
K07pplg202u:206: sacet punar bhagavaṃn anabhilāpyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇis tad dānapāramitayā api bhagavaṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati /
K07pplg202u:207: 13 śīlapāramitayāḥ kṣāntipāramitayāḥ vīryapāramitayāḥ dhyānapāramitayāḥ prajñāpāramitayāḥ api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati /
K07pplg202u:209: [GBM 577.1 = LPG(Ch) 205r] mārgasya aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānām anupūrvasamāpattīnāṃ
K07pplg202u:210: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ mahāmaitryā
K07pplg202u:214: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām abhāvo bhaviṣyati /
K07pplg202u:215: eṣāṃ ca dharmāṇām abhāvāt sarvākārajñatāyā apy abhāvo
K07pplg202u:217: sarvākārajñatāyā abhāvāt ko hy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyate /
K07pplg202u:220: evam etat subhūte evam etat* nānabhilāpyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā / sa
K07pplg202u:221: 4 cet punaḥ subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K07pplg202u:222: bhāvayataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyamānasyopāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K07pplg202u:224: atha ca punar asyaivaṃ bhavati nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā /
K07pplg202u:225: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāṃ manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs
K07pplg202u:226: 6 tāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayati tathā ca pariṇamayati /
K07pplg202u:227: yathā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ
K07pplg202u:228: 7 dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāṃ manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs tāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayati
K07pplg202u:231: 8 samyaksaṃbodhiḥ āha kathaṃ bhagavaṃn anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
K07pplg202u:233: yā subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
K07pplg202u:238: yā subhūte rūpasya tathatā yāvad yā nirvāṇasya tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sā naiva vardhate na parihīyate tat subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
K07pplg202u:239: 10 prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhīkṣṇaṃ bahulaṃ viharati na kasya cid dharmasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇiṃ vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg202u:240: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilāpyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na
K07pplg202u:241: 11 parihāṇi / evaṃ khalu subhūte dānapāramitāyā śīlapāramitāyā kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā prajñāpāramitāyā naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ / evaṃ
K07pplg202u:242: 12 yāvat pratisaṃvidāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ /
K07pplg202u:243: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ /
